block.h2: How Cool Will Your school Be?
block.p:
I think my school will be better in the future. It’ll have
1solar panels on the roof to save money. We’ll have
2touch screen controls in the classroom that are fun to use but won’t break! The school will also give us 3recyclable pens and paper because they’re better for the planet. Our computers will be 4wireless so that we can use them anywhere in the school. I hope the uniform will be more fashionable, too. Finally, I think my school will use electric buses but they won’t be
5driverless .
